promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary ibex electric-type pokemon wearing yellow and teal bracers. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltibexil, a a chibi cute legendary ibex electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Wild Charge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "electric" or "Voltibexil". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, ibex-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This legendary creature, tapping into raw storms, frolics atop cloud cloaked peaks. Its Wild Charge ability sparks joy and lightning!
